WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
 
I experienced a problem with the AutoCompleteBox Component in 3.5.50211.1:
When entering the "search" test, the ItemsSource list is updated in the Populating Event Handler (I also used FilterMode="Contains"... same problem).
When this list contains more than exactly 15 items, scrolling through the popup (or by using the arrow keys) brings up duplicates and other selected items differ from those I click at, but only from the 15th item on.
 
Is this problem known or is there a workaround?
 
Best regards,
Michael
WorkItem.Summary: AutoCompleteBox Popup display bug with more that 15 items
